title: Ep: 167: The Fat Trap - How Not to Get Discouraged About Difficulty Losing Weight
description: Guess What? Bad news: if you've ever been overweight and you're trying to lose weight it's even harder than you think.  Yikes.  Pretty de-motivating.  However, let's see what motivational psychologists would have to say about this.  How to keep from throwing up your hands at the whole effort.
